participant_1.background:
I got to go on a road trip with my siblings to celebrate my birthday.
i drive a prius.
I prefer to live in the suburbs, where I can enjoy my country music without having to worry about disturbing anyone.
I work and live with my wife, and we love chai tea.
I enjoy coffee to help me focus on my work and family.

participant_2.background:
I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning.
I collect memories of my best friend from out of town.
I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family.
My parents are my heroes.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do on the weekends?
I enjoy writing and going to the library, but I don't get to do that often.
I love reading and writing too! I'm a writer myself.
Really? That's great! What do you like to write?
I write children's books. I love coming up with creative stories and characters.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to write a book, but I'm not sure where to start.
You should definitely try it! There are a lot of resources available online that can help you get started.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll definitely look into it.
You're welcome! What kind of writing do you enjoy the most?
I love writing short stories and poems. I also enjoy writing music.
That's awesome! I love music too. What kind of music do you like to write?
I like to write all kinds of music, but I mostly write pop and rock.
Cool! I love pop music. I'm always listening to new music.
Me too! I love discovering new artists.
That's great! I'm sure we have a lot in common.
Yeah, I think we do. I'm glad we met!
